meanings.sent1: I will ozonate the water to make it cleaner.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician will ozonate the air to remove any impurities.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to ozonate the salad for a unique flavor twist.
meanings.sent4: She could almost see the freshness in the air after they ozonated it.
meanings.sent5: After they ozonate the room, you can feel the difference in the air quality.

meanings.sent1: The machine can ozonate oxygen into ozone for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Scientists have discovered a way to ozonate certain gases in the atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The magician claimed he could ozonate water into a magical elixir.
meanings.sent4: The artist's work seemed to ozonate the very essence of the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The process of ozonating the chemicals was crucial for the desired outcome.
